entry.title: List of approved pools
entry.summary: A discussion thread on the bitcoin-dev mailing list from July 4, 2015 shows Geir Harald Hansen asking how to get Bitminter on the list of approved pools at bitcoin.org's SPV mining alert. In response, Jameson Lopp suggests opening an issue or submitting a pull request on GitHub. The link to the specific page on GitHub where this can be done is also provided. No further information or context is given in the thread.
